Welcome!

Hello WoWers! We are the WoW.Me team, a group of dedicated gamers with a goal of improving your day-to-day WoW gameplay and experience.

As the game is getting more and more complex, the choices we make become more important. Talents, condults, legenderies, each play a role in how we perform and getting them right is key to success!

In addition to the various systems that affect your power, the game has more and more things to keep track of, be it dailies, achievements, raid or dungeon runs and the list goes on and on.

Over the coming period we will be working on many other exciting features using statistical analysis of leading players to make decisions for you!

We are doing our best to continue to WoW.You!!

In our roadmap we plan to help you track your activities, quests, and goals, help you decide which gear to focus on, how to collaborate with other players and many more features!

We need your help! Your feedback, ideas, and support are super helpful for us to continue to make WoW.Me better. Of course, if you are willing to become our patron to help us dedicate more time and effort, this will be amazing.

Our app offers different recommendations for your build, tailored for your desired content.

UPDATE: V1.0

  • We are live! Our Talent Picker feature is up and running and ready to be used!
  • No more annoying alt-tabbing to find the right talents for each Dungeon or Raid boss!
  • Ideal for building your Alts or if you’re a rising star.
  • By analyzing the leading players in various brackets this feature helps you make the correct decision when it comes to picking the best talents for the situation you’re in.
  • We allow you to see what best players do split by dungeons/raid, levels and to your specific spec.
